adHeader: BERKELEY apartment cleaning. MOVE OUT cleaning/LAST MINUTE OK $12/HR
adDetails: My mother Lai and I Diann, we work as house cleaner specially MOVE IN AND MOVE OUT apartment and home in the ALBANY and EL CERRITO area. We have all of our equipment including Dyson heavy duty DC28 animal vacuum cleaner that can extract your deep carpet and pet hair with ease. Our electric Eureka steam mop can clean and sazitize your bathroom and kitchen flooring. Our degreaser can clean out your oven like new(see picture below we use best & newest equipment for your household cleaning). We also bring all our own liquid cleaning solution more than enough to do the job( we will use your cleaning solution if requested). We don't mind working on weekend and holiday. We do monthly, weekly and daily for $12/hr. We charge flat fee for MOVE OUT cleaning. We do our best to accomodate last minute cleaning. Please call our son in law Trin at show contact info if you are interested our service. Thank you
